page.title: 11A Walk At Newmillerdam
page.content: Start:- Newmillerdam Car Park. Route Descript.Dist.3 Km. Time l.5 hrs Leave car park at the lake and turning right follow lake along well-marked track. As the lake is left behind follow track until a path runs off to the right. Follow path for 50 yds. until you reach a junction. Turn left here for a pleasant walk through Bushcliff Wood. From this point on take every left turn available until you again return to the lake but this time on the opposite side from where you started. Continue on past the Boat House and take the track to the right. This takes you to one of the entrances to Chevet Park. Turn left here onto Hill Top Road for a walk down through Newmillerdam village. Across the dam and back to the car park, pausing perhaps at the Dam Inn or Beulay Cafe for refreshment.
